Text: Progres 2: Because this rock band played in the totalitarian state, they had a few troubles with officials.

Text: Progres 2:  The song was called "Planeta Hieronyma Bosche" (The Planet of Hieronymus Bosch) where the band sings about life on heroin.

<Text: Progres 2:  Censors forbade this song and the band solved it by using only the vowels from the original lyrics.>

Text: Progres 2:  At concerts they played the whole original lyrics.
